II.i.2.A.2.h
.
Checking for Blank Spaces on the Application or Insufficient Information
If a claimant omits necessary information on an application, determine if it is substantially complete.
References
:  For more information on
VA’s duty to notify claimants of necessary information or evidence, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.B.1.a
criteria for substantially complete applications, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 1.A.4.f
, and
screening for a complete application and notification requirements, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Process Overview for Screening Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
